TEXT.TITLE: COMMONWEALTH MORTGAGE <CCMC> BUYS ARMONK FIRM
TEXT.BODY: Commonwealth Mortgage Co said it purchased Westfiar Funding Corp of Armonk, N.Y., for an undisclosed amount of cash. Commonwealth said Westfair originated 60 mln dlrs of residential mortgage loans during 1986. Reuter
